issue.title: [Rust] [Website] Update implementation status page
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10466](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10466). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This page is very out of date for the Rust implementation.

 <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/status.html>

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10466?focusedCommentId=17226256) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
The PR that updates integration tests also includes the documentation for the passing tests.

We're behind with some integration aspects, so I didn't feel comfortable marking things as supported if there are still some issues with them.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10466?focusedCommentId=17585985) by @toddfarmer:*
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
